record.author: Blust, from Van Balen, & Anceaux
record.notes: v is [β]. Van Balen's materials may be reliable (collected in the first half of the 20th century), but Anceaux relies on second-hand sources and transcriptions, so while general word shapes are accurate details may be off (ie b for β, etc).
record.classification: Austronesian, Malayo-Polynesian, Central-Eastern Malayo-Polynesian, Eastern Malayo-Polynesian, South Halmahera-West New Guinea, West New Guinea, Cenderawasih Bay, Yapen, Central-Western
record.source: @book{121185, address = {'s-Gravenhage}, note = {35}, pages = {166}, publisher = {Martinus Nijhoff}, series = {Verhandelingen van het Koninglijk instituut voor taal-, land- en volkenkunde}, title = {The Linguistic Situation in the Islands of Yapen, Kurudu, Nau and Miosnum, New Guinea}, url = {http://www.papuaweb.org/dlib/bk1/kitlv/}, volume = {35}, year = {1961}, bibtexkey = {anceaux_kurudu-miosnum1961}, class_loc = {PL6265}, document_type = {B}, fn = {papua\anceaux_yapen1961.pdf, papua\anceaux_yapen1961_o.pdf, papua\anceaux_yapen1961v2_o.pdf, papua\anceaux_miosnumxxxv1961.pdf, papua\anceaux_yapen1961_o.pdf}, hhtype = {overview;comparative;wordlist}, inlg = {English [eng]}, inlg_code = {eng}, macro_area = {Papua}, mpi_eva_library_shelf = {PL 6265 ANC 1961}, mpifn = {yapen_anceaux1961_o.pdf}, src = {hh, mpieva}, srctrickle = {hh#hvw:Anceaux:Yapen, mpieva#Anceaux1961Thelingu}, subject_headings = {Islands–Geelvink Bay–Languages, Islands–Geelvink Bay–Languages}, author = {Anceaux, Johannes Cornelis} } @article{van1915a, date = {1915}, title = {Windesische verhalen met vertaling en woordenlijst}, journal = {Bijdragen tot de Taal-, Land- en Volkenkunde}, volume = {70}, pages = {441–554}, language = {nl}, author = {van Balen, J.A.} }
